lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Gros said that during their 12-day globe-trotting tour of several countries, he and Finance Minister Dilson Funaro warned creditors that Brazil could no longer continue representing the role of merely an exporter of capital.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In Brasilia, sources linked to the Presidency said Brazil was preparing a new program of economic readjustment to strengthen its negotiations on its 109 billion dlr foreign debt.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Central Bank president Francisco Gros said possible retaliation by Brazil's creditors would not be an intelligent measure because it would affect both sides.
